word_mean: 精神分裂样的，类精神分裂症的：一种表现为精神分裂样人格的怕羞、过敏、孤僻及内向特性的
精神分裂样特性：分裂性人格者，不仅表现有精神分裂样人格障碍性害羞及离群，而且有精神分裂型人格障碍性怪癖和无逻辑或奇异想法者的特性

sentence.Network_en: With calm, dreamy, almost schizoid logic, she explains that her appearance will be important.
sentence.Network_cn: 她以镇定 、 迷惘 、 近乎自相矛盾的逻辑说明她的仪表将是很重要的.

entry.tran: (人)自相矛盾的，前后不一致的，反复无常的
entry.def: If you describe someone as schizoid, you mean that they seem to have very different opinions and purposes at different times.

example.tran: 一个相当反复无常的家伙

entry.def: Someone who is schizoid suffers from schizophrenia.

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to or characteristic of schizophrenia
2. marked by withdrawal and inability to form close relationships

auth_sentence.content: Some schizoid patients...may proclaim their disdain for convention by eccentricity in dress.
